Package com.ammrat13.javagame.objects

Interface GamePlaySceneObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Spaceship, TestMovingObject, TestObject

    public interface GamePlaySceneObject
    This interface provides the methods an object in the game scene must implement

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Vec getPos​()
      Gets the position of the object.
      int getZ​()
      Determines the drawing order on the scene.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage render​()
      Renders the object.
      Vec renderOffset​()
      Returns the image's offset.
      void update​(int dt, java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> kCodes)
      This method will be used to update the object every frame.

    • Method Detail

      • getPos

        Vec getPos​()
        Gets the position of the object.
        Returns:
        The position of the object in the scene

      • getZ

        int getZ​()
        Determines the drawing order on the scene. Lower z-values are drawn first.
        Returns:
        The z-value of the object

      • render

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage render​()
        Renders the object.
        Returns:
        The image of this object to be rendered into the scene

      • renderOffset

        Vec renderOffset​()
        Returns the image's offset. Since images have their origin in the top-left corner, an offset is required so the object's position is at the center of the image.
        Returns:
        The vector to add to to the top-left corner to get to the center

      • update

        void update​(int dt,
            java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> kCodes)
        This method will be used to update the object every frame.
        Parameters:
        dt - The time that has passed since the last frame (ms)
        kCodes - The set of keys that are pressed down
